data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The study also doesn't compare exercise types. Aerobic ____ is ____ to ____ more ____ than ____ type ____ and ____ more ____ is a combination ____ resistance ____ aerobic ____. Whilst this study excellent at proving improved glycemic control through high-intensity resistance training there are better interventions out there that are not represented or acknowledged in this study.
data.partBlankContent: The study also doesn't compare exercise types. Aerobic exer____ is sh___ to b_ more effe_____ than resis_____ type trai____ and ev__ more effe_____ is a combination o_ resistance a__ aerobic exer_____. Whilst this study excellent at proving improved glycemic control through high-intensity resistance training there are better interventions out there that are not represented or acknowledged in this study.
data.fullContent: The study also doesn't compare exercise types. Aerobic exercise is shown to be more effective than resistance type training and even more effective is a combination of resistance and aerobic exercises. Whilst this study excellent at proving improved glycemic control through high-intensity resistance training there are better interventions out there that are not represented or acknowledged in this study.
data.answer: 这项研究也没有对运动类型进行比较。有氧运动被证明比阻力训练更有效，甚至阻力和有氧运动的结合更有效。虽然这项研究很好地证明了通过高强度抵抗训练可以改善血糖控制，但还有一些更好的干预手段在这项研究中没有体现出来，也没有得到认可。
